Title: An Act Changing the Name of Sto. Tomas Elementary School in the Municipality of Passi, Province of Iloilo, into Fidelidad J. Santibañez Memorial Elementary School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 308
An Act Changing the Name of Sto. Tomas Elementary School in the Municipality of Passi, Province of Iloilo, into Fidelidad J. Santibañez Memorial Elementary School
Section 1. The name of Sto. Tomas Elementary School in the Municipality of Passi, Province of Iloilo, is hereby changed to Fidelidad J. Santibanez Memorial Elementary School.
Section 2. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1âwphi1
Approved: November 14, 1982
